description: a(n) = [n/1] +[n/(2^2)] + [n/(3^3)] + [n/(4^4)]+...+[n/(k^k)+..., up to infinity, where [ ] is the floor function.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) \p 10 v=[]; for(n=1,120,v=concat(v,suminf(k=1,floor(n/k^k)))); v(PARI) for (n=1, 1000, write("b062071.txt", n, " ", suminf(k=1, n\k^k)\1) ) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009(PARI) a(n)=sum(k=1,exp(lambertw(log(n)))+1,n\k^k) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 28 2015
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 13 2001
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 21 2001
